segments.text: Oh you look awful ! What ’ s the matter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh ! I feel really under the weather . I ’ Ve got a sore throat and a bad cough .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh dear . Maybe you ’ Ve caught a cold .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I ’ Ve had lots of overtime to do recently and I haven ’ t slept much at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well then , you should get some rest this weekend and don ’ t go out drinking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think you ’ re right !
segments.speaker: S2
